original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, just as his father Amaziah had done.
korean_text: 아사랴가 그의 아버지 아마샤의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 옳은 일을 행하였으며

sentences.original_text: just as his father Amaziah had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아마샤가 행한 것 같이
